articles.title: 10 teams with plenty to do in the new year - MLB.com
articles.description:
It’s a new year, and a new season is in sight. Spring Training begins Feb. 20, leaving only 50 days until MLB clubs take the field for the first time in 2026.
That means the offseason is starting to wind down -- even though plenty of teams with their sights
